name: Punch 'Em All
description:
Use your flying punch to defeat all the townspeople that went mad!

This game was developed in 9 days for VR Jam 2022. The VR Jam 2022 theme was "One-Time Use". 

Punch 'Em All takes inspiration from old times 2D Flash games about ricocheting bullets. Levels are completed once all enemies from the level are KO'ed with your single punch.

Gameplay tutorial is included, see controls below:

  • Right Joystick - Teleport
  • Left Joystick - Snap Turn
  • Right Trigger - Launch Punch
  • Left Trigger (pressed/release) - Control/Redirect flying punch

Available for PC VR

3D Assets:

AssetsVille Town - UE Marketplace

VR Hands - Jonathan Bardwell

Tri-Tachyon - Jazzy Vibes #36 - Loop - Smooth Jazz - Available in Freesound:

This is our first GameJam project made in Unreal Engine, all our previous gamedev was done in Unity. Check out our other games  here:
